item.title: [LeetCode] 237. Delete Node in a Linked List
item.author: Debakar Roy
item.description: Delete Node in a Linked List Link to original Problem on LeetCode Write a function to delete a node (except the tail) in a singly linked list, given only access to that node. Given linked list – head = [4,5,1,9], which looks like following: Example 1: Input: head = [4,5,1,9], node = 5 Output: [4,1,9] Explanation: You are given the second node with value 5, the linked list should become 4 -> 1 -> 9 after calling your function.
